scenes.background: Monica glances at you, raising an eyebrow.
scenes.description: Listing potential pitfalls is fine, but it might slow us down. What’s your take?

options.text: We could list the major risks only and proceed quickly with the minor ones.
options.analysis: You propose a balanced approach, maintaining pace while acknowledging potential risks, showing good self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: Monica, we need to be thorough to avoid mistakes. It’s worth the time.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of thoroughness, showing empathy towards risk management and motivation to ensure quality.

options.text: Addressing potential issues as they come up could save us more time.
options.analysis: You highlight a more agile approach, showing good perception of the urgency but lower empathy towards thorough planning.
